website_summaries.verdict: An affordable, compact model that's easy to carry. Ideal for consumers who don't want a large or extremely powerful model, although it does deliver a reasonably powerful jolt.
pros: Conveniently compact, which makes it easy to fit in a bag, purse, or pocket
Has a rechargeable battery and built-in flashlight
cons: Some reports of units that quit charging after several weeks or months of ownership
Not as powerful as some contenders

customer_reviews.title: Ouch
customer_reviews.text: This thing packs a punch and will get anyone off u in a hurry, I shocked my self to see what it would do before I do it to others, and it's still very visible after a week
customer_reviews.author: Christian G.

customer_reviews.title: College student tested and approved
customer_reviews.text: Sent this to my daughter who lives in another state after her apartment was broken into while she was sleeping. I checked with a relative who is a police officer to see what he thought before I bought it and after talking to him I ordered it. She loves it and feels more secure when she gets off work late. One of her roommates volunteered to let my daughter try it out on her and it definitely works (she won't be volunteering again:) Thanks to Amazon Prime she got it very quickly.
customer_reviews.author: A. Gardner

customer_reviews.title: DANK
customer_reviews.text: I accidently bought this but when it came in and me and my buddies tazed each other with it. Very painful and very scary. Lots of fun. No regrets.
customer_reviews.author: Andre M

customer_reviews.title: Keeping my agents a little safer
customer_reviews.text: I am a real estate team leader and bought 3 of the black and 7 of the pink for the agents on my team. With all of the news about people attacking agents, I wanted my folks to have just a little more assurance that they may not ever see that problem occur with them. Your product fit that bill. Thank you also for the speedy delivery so that I could give them out at our team retreat. PS During the boring part of every meeting right after lunch folks started to nod off. I turned mine on and hit the button. Everyone was awake immediately!! At least I thought it was funny!!
customer_reviews.author: Rick Hogue

customer_reviews.title: Works really well..!!
customer_reviews.text: I really love this product and its powerful and I used it today because someone tried to rob me and I tazed him and dropped him🙃
customer_reviews.author: Ana

customer_reviews.title: A very good tazor indeed
customer_reviews.text: A very good tazor indeed. Tased my friend who was playing playstation and he sent the controller flying at the tv and broke the screen. Ended up buying a new TV. Also works quite well if you're studying late at night and need to keep urself awake. Beats coffee by a long shot. Highly recommend to any college students and anyone else who procrastinates in general. As far as the device itself, last I checked it holds a charge for a while. Worked for at least 100 shots for me before I felt like I should charge it.
customer_reviews.author: alex shulyak

customer_reviews.title: VIPERTEK VTS-880-30 Billion Mini Stun Gun
customer_reviews.text: This stun gun is a JOKE!!! I was being attacked and thought to use my brand new fully charged stun gun, for ABSOLUTELY nothing to happen. He did not feel anything, he did not stop, he did not freeze for a second. I left the situation with 2 broke ribs and a beat up face . This Stun gun make a lot of noise but no bit. I WOULD NOT RECOMMEND THIS PRODUCT TO ANYONE!!!!EVER
customer_reviews.author: TS500

customer_reviews.title: Morning runner and Young adult
customer_reviews.text: Ladies! Please get this! I got this product due to me being 5ft tall and a having a protective parent and running at 4 in the morning with coyotes and predators around, so when I first got it i was almost terrified of it, especially turning it on for 2 SEConds! My dog and I just looked at each other with a full face of “oh ma god”. It’s also very small the size of a computer mouse. Suppper intense!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great stun gun
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Convienant charging plug. Good flashlight. Compact design. Very aggressive sound when you hit the zap button. I'll update if I ever get to use it on someone.
customer_reviews.author: Sherman

customer_reviews.title: Stopped charging. Lifetime Warranty is a JOKE!
customer_reviews.text: Had this for about a year. It stopped charging. Tried contacting company about the claim they make in listing about lifetime warranty and never got any response. So many companies say they have warranties and when you try to claim it they make it impossible to do so. This is one of those companies.
customer_reviews.author: FRGII

customer_reviews.title: Seems like they skimped on quality for this product
customer_reviews.text: The electric zapper did not work at all after opening the box. I then charged it and it still does not work at all. The light worked out of the box but it is not very bright. Seems like they skimped on quality for this product. I would not buy this product again for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Wayne S

customer_reviews.title: Best product ever
customer_reviews.text: This thing is not a joke , i stuned my leg with this taser & couldnt move it for about a minute .
customer_reviews.author: Nathaniel bevok

customer_reviews.title: Weak taser period !
customer_reviews.text: Very week. Fly zapper is better 😂 Do not buy , instead buy stick style on a pricey side they work better.
customer_reviews.author: Ms. 66666

customer_reviews.title: Please dont defend yourself with this.
customer_reviews.text: It makes a lot of racket but thats it. Ive used these on myself or had other use it on me to prove a point. This thing will not save you. Does it suck to get tased? yes I feel it its not pleasant but I demonstrate just how useless it is as protection. If someone were actually out to harm you this would not stop then even a little bit. anyone would just power through is or easily disarm you.
customer_reviews.author: Brian and Shelbi

customer_reviews.title: stops working...never charges
customer_reviews.text: worked ince or twice.. then stopped working at all... battery seemed dead and would never charge, even after 1 week of charging....
customer_reviews.author: chris allen

customer_reviews.title: Non lethal protection and inexpensive
customer_reviews.text: I love this taser! I would take it with me when I would ride the train so I wouldn't have to deal with unruly commuters, better option non lethal than pulling out my blade. At work it came in handy when a coyote kept coming at me and I tried scaring it away with my voice by yelling and swinging my duffle bag in a "infinity" sign motion, it still kept coming so I pulled out my taser and with the noise the taser made the coyote took off super fast. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: C. Trinidad

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: I charged it and it worked at first. Two weeks later and it was completely broken. Will not be purchasing ever again.
customer_reviews.author: Madison Grimmett

customer_reviews.title: Smart Purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Great stun gun for self defense! I actually purchased this for my girlfriend and she loves how easy it is to use. Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Kaleb

customer_reviews.title: works great at scaring away dogs too!!!
customer_reviews.text: nice my wife takes it with her when she goes for her afternnon walks and we have a lot of dogs in our neighborhood and shes used 3 or 4 times to scare them off all she has to do hit the trigger a couple times the dogs take off running and im talking about pit bulls German shephards and other big dogs they scurry at the sound of this thing!!!
customer_reviews.author: Renato

customer_reviews.title: it works fine. No way to see if it's full charge
customer_reviews.text: Yeah, it's a cheap taser. But it came with some serious problems. It had a loud rattle as soon as I pulled it out of the box, which isn't a huge deal but as soon as I flicked the switched I noticed the LED was flickering. Gee, time to take it apart already to do a repair. After patching up the poorly done tape job connecting the LED to the battery and supergluing some components down, it works fine. No way to see if it's full charge, falls out of the electrical socket too easily. But considering there are tasers out there that near $1000, it's generally excusable.
customer_reviews.author: ryan bliss

customer_reviews.title: You need one of these, ladies!
customer_reviews.text: Ok, so I was not very sure about this one. I am a female alone in the city and figured a firearm would just be too much. It came in the mail very quickly and its pouch is handy and everything is compact. I got over the fear of using it but doing a test run. It zaps very loudly. This makes since I suppose with electricity shooting out of the top. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great to have a stun gun at such a low price
customer_reviews.text: Great for the price. Unlike orhers i haven't used this on myself so im not sure how effective it is. One reason i took a star off was that i had clipped on my belt and was very happy that they gave us a pouch but the pouch broke off in 2 weeks. So it cannot really take the weight of the device its supposed to carry. Either give a better one or just dont give it. Save environment resources and don't give crappy stuff even for free.
customer_reviews.author: Dee

customer_reviews.title: Tiny and mighty.
customer_reviews.text: This little thing is awesome! Haven’t had to use it on anyone, but...did use it on a dog that was attacking one of my animals. Stopped the attack, the dog lost control of his bladder, and ran away...and my animal will live. About the size of a deck of cards. And I like that it has a self contained wall charger.
customer_reviews.author: TMB

customer_reviews.title: The CASE is GARBAGE!!! Be Careful!
customer_reviews.text: Two stars for the quality of the product and and the case belt loop is so flimsey that you will lose it off your hip. The seller needs to be more responsible with a higher quality case so it is not lost due to poor quality. Tazer is cheap and I do not recommend if you are looking for something that you will not lose off your belt clip as I lost mine this morning due to a poor quality case. Be careful not to lose it so that it does not end up in the wrong hands. The seller needs to upgrade the quality of the case IMMEDIATELY!
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: It stops working in less than a week.
customer_reviews.text: If you feel like wasting couple dollars then feel free to buy this product. Otherwise DON’T WASTE YOUR DAMN MONEY ON THIS JUNK. It took literally 5 days for it to start acting like what you can see in the video. I know that you get what you paid for but I sure as hell didn’t expect it to last less than a damn week.
customer_reviews.author: Musse Afework

customer_reviews.title: Pros and cons......
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use. I had a volunteer test the shock and he said it definitely stings, but we also determined that an attacker's first reaction will most likely be to jump back quickly, become angered and then attempt to take the device away. Being this does not have a wrist strap, it could easily be taken away and...because of this, I would not recommend relying solely on this device for protection, but more as a scare tactic. The sound is definitely intimidating but if you use something like this on an attacker, I strongly recommend learning some self defense and escape tactics to back it up.
customer_reviews.author: N. Reed

customer_reviews.title: Got this as a non-lethal in my car. To ...
customer_reviews.text: Got this as a non-lethal in my car. To make sure it works I had a friend test it on me and after getting hit with it once I have no intentions of getting hit with the stun gun again. I am 6'2" 200 pounds and it froze me. I even had burn marks where it made contact with me. More than confident that it would prevent someone from coming at you. Even the sound is intimidation.
customer_reviews.author: Ren Rasmussen

customer_reviews.title: Tiny, makes me feel safe. Found a case for it also.
customer_reviews.text: Small and easy to use. I carry this around when taking the subway or walking home from work at night in the city. I wanted a case to carry it in and ended up buying this one: Vertical Leather Case with Magnetic closure with belt clip for AT&T LG b470 flip phone  It fits the taser perfectly. A bit snug but it does fit and it has a clip to clip to your belt or pants.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Great gun
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. Small yet effective. Love the easy charging (no adapters). Belt loop came off as soon as I put it on. The case is fine but the bell strap, not so much.
customer_reviews.author: Dale

customer_reviews.title: Fits comfortably in the hand
customer_reviews.text: Bought two: one for me and one for my partner. As two women, we needed a little bit of security walking the dog in the morning when it was dark and walking to and from our cars. Fits comfortably in the hand, no-slip grip is a plus. Taser function is loud, bright, and seems effective, although I haven't had to use it. Just testing it in my apartment scared the crap out of our animals. It should do its job.
customer_reviews.author: Beatrice DeSabatino

customer_reviews.title: use for running alone
customer_reviews.text: I noticed this scary guy on my hiking trail twice starting at me. He followed behind me twice.. so now I get nervous hiking by myself. No exercise does the body or stress no good. the gyms are closed right now so I purchased this. You can tell it is VERY powerful and very easy to use. You can hold it in your hand. Feeling much safer! I would recommend you purchase! I'm glad I didn't buy the $29.99 thinking that was better. NOooo this is it! The price is a steal! works great too!
customer_reviews.author: B. Tru

customer_reviews.title: Get one!
customer_reviews.text: I saw this product and I knew I needed one. It’s an added layer of protection and can fit comfortably in a cross body purse, shoulder purse and depending on the clutch maybe even that too. You can also loop it through your belt, but the material does feel a little flimsy for that so if either get a new case or just stick with and put it elsewhere. It is loud, but that’s to be expected with a stun gun. I’m super happy with the purchase and as always keep this away from children and practice safety!
customer_reviews.author: Angie E.

customer_reviews.title: I received this for Christmas I feel so much better having it on me
customer_reviews.text: I received this for Christmas I feel so much better having it on me. I have a parking garage I have to go in and out of at night and walk a short distance to reach my job. My husband was concern for my safety. Not sure how it works because I haven't used it lol. But I will say it sounds powerful...
customer_reviews.author: Key_keylocs

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t light up while charging
customer_reviews.text: Just received this, I’m charging it and the red light doesn’t light up. According to questions and answers it should light up red while charging. Think I have to return it.
customer_reviews.author: NightCrawler

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: Had my wife give me a short zap on my arm to see how this thing works. It works! Stung like hell and penetrated DEEP into the tissue. I've had to use it a couple of times to ward off unleashed dogs rushing at my dog on our walks. I haven't had to touch the animal with it. Just the sound is enough to provide a long enough distraction for the owner to pick themselves up off the ground and regain control of their dogs.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff O.

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Delivered quickly, well packed, product was as promised. no surprises, met expectations. Fits easily in a purse, backpack or laptop bag. Will be buying more.
customer_reviews.author: Valarie

customer_reviews.title: Great product, great price
customer_reviews.text: Got this for a friend who checks on multiple construction sites for work. She's almost always alone and some job sites are pretty isolated. I doubted it was powerful enough to stop anybody because it was so cheap, lightweight and compact but I read the reviews and gave it a shot. Glad I did! When it goes off the charge it puts out looks very strong and powerful! It makes a whole lotta noise too and I'm confident it has stopping power. It's my new go to gift for friends.
customer_reviews.author: nicole

customer_reviews.title: Attention getting
customer_reviews.text: My only dislike is the carrying case, it was rather flimsy, but I was able to find another case that it fits into ( Golden Sheeps Military Grade Heavy Duty Holster Nylon Metal Clip Compatible with Insulin Pump, CGM Device, Glucose Meter, Inhaler, Rugged Nylon Canvas Carrying Case with Belt Clip 4 X 2.2 X 1 Inch) which is also on Amazon. Haven't tried it on anyone or anything and I hope I don't. When I've demonstrated it to my family and friends that practically jump out of their skins. Same when our dogs heard it. So it does have an attention getting factor. Fair price, fast shipping. PS the carrying case note about is only about $9.00.
customer_reviews.author: David C. Arlund

customer_reviews.title: Sounds like it would hurt but I'm not trying it
customer_reviews.text: Nice little machine, only thing is the button is tightly being squeezed by the actual carrier which scares me that it's going to go off on its own. It hasn't so maybe it won't I don't know. I do enjoy the fact that the charging component is integrated into the actual machine. Overall I think it was a good buy
customer_reviews.author: cosita7550

customer_reviews.title: The best weapon is one you don't have to use
customer_reviews.text: The problem with reviewing stun guns and their effectiveness is like reviewing how effective my high powered handgun was on a home intruder. It simply doesn't happen every day. The odds of me using this stun gun are so small, and I refuse to use it on myself, that I can't give a complete accurate review on how effective it is. But it is a stun gun and comes with an advertisement of several million volts so after about 10 seconds of deep consideration I rated it 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: T. McCord

customer_reviews.title: Yes, I would trust this $10 stun gun with my life
customer_reviews.text: I've heard people say about motorcycle gear "Do you really want a 100$ bucket to protect your head?' and in my experience, a 100$ helmet absolutely can protect your head. Similarly about stun guns, they say 'Would you trust a $10 taser to save you?' I opened this $10 taser, and it's no joke. Even if it doesn't have a ton of power behind it, it's loud enough to make a statement, and anyone thinking about bothering you will think twice. Maybe even three times.
customer_reviews.author: CRC

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my needs
customer_reviews.text: Yikes! Tested it for less than a second on the air and boy does it pop. The little flashlight feature will be so helpful! It has a little red light that turns on when charging it, and you only need to charge it once a month. I wanted one of these as a precaution and the price was right. I’m hoping that I’ll never need to actually use this product’s main feature on anyone. I’ll be keeping this in my backpack, so the case that comes with it will be just fine for me.
customer_reviews.author: C and H

customer_reviews.title: Test subject wanted
customer_reviews.text: So far I haven't had a chance to use it on a bad guy, so I can't give it five stars. Anyone want to be a guinea pig so I have the opportunity to evaluate the effects to potentially give this device five stars? I do like the fact this device is small, self-contained power plug, rechargeable. Again, I don't know how strong the effect is at this time.
customer_reviews.author: B. Brent

customer_reviews.title: Snap Crackle and Pop
customer_reviews.text: Never needed to use it, luckily. Nice to have one of these products in case of an emergency. Only complaint is that it may be somewhat difficult to get ready in certain situations. Everyone should own something like this, and at this price-point and size, everyone can. Put in your car door pocket, or take it with you if you're going out late.
customer_reviews.author: Jack Bauer

customer_reviews.title: Loud Sound..poor design
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to like this device, but the charging port did not ‘tell’ you when the device was fully charged. The plug would not stay plugged in due to a faulty plug switch [the switch where you move the plug in/out of the device]. It does make a loud sound and it does leave two burn marks but other than that..the look and sound can be used to make anyone think twice about seeing if the device works. The fact that you must be extremely close for this device to potentially work, may deter the user from using it since no one wants to be that close to an intruder/harmful person. It may work..but not for everyone.
customer_reviews.author: DM

customer_reviews.title: Didn't stop someone
customer_reviews.text: Tazed somebody.. didn't slow them down.. got hit in the face.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Mattson

customer_reviews.title: stopped working
customer_reviews.text: just after 2 years i finally needed to use it on dog attack and it would not work. battery was at full charge unfortunately i could not stop him with the flash light which did work. guess i depended on it working when fully charged but instead ended up with a ripped open arm needing 30 plus stitches. with a lifetime warranty you would expect a better product plus their was no offer of replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Lee adkins

customer_reviews.title: Whoa!
customer_reviews.text: As a 20-something female who just moved to a large, urban city, I wanted a gadget that would allow me to feel safer if ever I'm out and about alone. I haven't used this stun gun on anyone (and I hope to never have to) but the noise it emits is enough to scare the bejesus out of ANYONE. DEFINITELY recommend it for that reason alone. It's very light - honestly it feels almost cheap in your hand - but it's easy to hold and is menacing as heck. Extremely glad I purchased and recommend every woman buy one too.
customer_reviews.author: Anne

customer_reviews.title: Added sense of security
customer_reviews.text: This is my third taser (I managed to lose the other 2). It's affordable and presumably effective, though I've been lucky enough to not have to use it. No batteries required; just plug it directly into an outlet. Small and light enough to fit in your purse. I definitely feel safer with one nearby, and I just purchased the flashlight version too. Recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Heather G.

customer_reviews.title: Small and mighty
customer_reviews.text: This thing seems to have a lot of oomph. It sounds loud and menacing. I have not tried it on myself or anyone else, and don’t plan on it. I love that it has an inner plug so you don’t have to figure out what cord goes to it. I had a larger viper tech, and liked that it had a curve to fit my hand, and a string to carry it with. This one is much smaller and easier to hold in my small hand, but no string. I still love having this and feel at peace when I am walking.
customer_reviews.author: octobersmiles

customer_reviews.title: Sounds like it will wirk
customer_reviews.text: Not perfect, but sounds like it will do the job. Won’t be holding to my neck to test, but scared the house cats from 30 feet just with one short blast. Won’t do that again either. I have it in my garage next to the door open switch. When someone knocks on the door and I have to open it to see who it is, I am very open to attack while the door opens. It was either one of these or a BFH... which I do have I the garage :)
customer_reviews.author: debrucer

customer_reviews.title: As described
customer_reviews.text: This is my 2nd product from Vipertek and both completely different models work as intended. This one doesn't hold as much voltage as my 1st purchase since this is the mini version but still packs a punch - a quick shock to my forearm to ensure quality of product. The sound it produces is as loud as the regular sized models. I have yet to test it's ability to hold a charge but if its like any of its other models then it should hold up just fine. The flashlight is just an added bonus so don't expect anything great out of it as this was mainly intended for self defense.
customer_reviews.author: Johnson

customer_reviews.title: great product !!!!
customer_reviews.text: so cheap you thinking it would be garbage but this product is grade I'd buy it again in this little guy packs quite a punch, the sound alone of the taser would scare anybody off
customer_reviews.author: SKOOTER P

customer_reviews.title: Worked for one day
customer_reviews.text: It worked the first time I tested it but the next day it was dead and never charged even though I plugged it in
customer_reviews.author: Jane Doe

customer_reviews.title: pretty much trash as any form of light source
customer_reviews.text: Zaps well, hurt when I had my wife test it on me.. zaps really well... The light on one wasn't working well, they sent me another one for free. Awesome customer service as I didn't even ask for it.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Santie D. Paws

customer_reviews.title: perfect for my college student
customer_reviews.text: When my daughter said she didn't feel safe on campus I began looking for a small stun gun. I bought this based on previous reviews. I would actually give this 4.5 stars because the first one I bought the flashlight did not work. Because of the price i decided to keep it and just purchase another instead of sending it back. The second arrived and works fine. I gave the 2nd one to my daughter and decided I can keep the first one for when i go on runs since i wouldn't need the flashlight. It does provide an intimidating sound. Have yet to try it on anyone.
customer_reviews.author: H Adkins

customer_reviews.title: Thumbs up!
customer_reviews.text: This taser is great! I’m a young female who tends to walk back from my college library at night and I always vary this. It’s very loud, which is great because it’s supposed to be a deterrent. It has definitely scared my friends when they have tried turning it on! Love that you can plug it into the wall to charge. The only thing I wish was better was the flashlight setting. It’s not very bright.
customer_reviews.author: Hattie

customer_reviews.title: Get the VTS-881 instead
customer_reviews.text: Pretty bulky to be honest and if you shock yourself through clothing it hurts about as much as one of those shock pens so if yiu have to use it aim for bare skin, not exactly displeased with it but I recommend you spend and extra 3 dollars on the vts-881 cause not only is it smaller and I guess stronger (7 billion volts instead of 5 billion) but it has a much better flashlight.
customer_reviews.author: xavier valdez

customer_reviews.title: Decent nice looking taser easy to use doesn't need the safety ...
customer_reviews.text: Decent nice looking taser easy to use doesn't need the safety pin like other taser although is not 400,000,000 volt advertisement is misleading and should be corrected I've use it on myself and friends it does hurt you do feel it but it wont stop an attacker so dont depend on this to safe you i would get some really strong mace pepper spray and aim directly to the eyes and run as fast as you can lol.
customer_reviews.author: Osie B

customer_reviews.title: I feel safe. Good child safety feature. Loud
customer_reviews.text: Thankfully I haven't had to use this at all, but the loudness of it is very scary. The sound it makes is sharp and it is lightweight. It fits in my purse perfectly but is easy to locate, pull out, and use if I needed to. There is also a child safety feature so I am not worried about my child or boyfriend's children getting a hold of it and harming themselves. I am very pleased with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Allison LaCombe

customer_reviews.title: seems to be reliable so far have not tried it on anyone
customer_reviews.text: slightly confused on the star point for the noise it is very loud which I'm not sure if it's supposed to or not haven't tried it out on anyone and hope that I don't have to the battery life seems to be very good in the flashlight seems to be pretty decent have had better flashlights but for being in a taser pretty good but other than that from what I understand this is like the second most powerful taser you can get on the Open Market and it's better to be safe than sorry
customer_reviews.author: kurtis

customer_reviews.title: BE CAREFUL AROUND CHILDREN AND TEACH ADULTS HOW TO USE IT.
customer_reviews.text: THIS UNIT CAN BE DANGEROUS IF NOT USED PROPERLY. ALWAYS REMEMBER, THIS IS NOT A TOY! I USED ONE SIMILAR TO THIS ONE AND I TAUGHT ADULTS HOW TO USE IT. IT WAS NECESSARY TO MAKE EACH INDIVIDUAL GET SHOCKED SO THEY UNDERSTOOD WHAT HAPPENS WHEN USED. IT WAS DONE ON THE AREA OF THE KNEE SO NO HARM WOULD COME TO THE PERSON. I SUGGEST YOU MAKE A VCR DISC BECAUSE THEY ARE CHEAP. THIS HELPS TO KEEP YOUR LIABILITY DOWN AND I WOULD HAVE THE INSTRUCTOR HAVE THE STUDENT SIGN A RELEASE. PERSONALLY I THINK EVERY PERSON SHOULD CARRY ONE WITH THE WAY THE WORLD IS TODAY.
customer_reviews.author: Howard Subnick

customer_reviews.title: Safety first
customer_reviews.text: I bought three a pink, purple and black one. The pink and purple are powerful but the black one is not so much. I think it may be off somewhere. They are perfect for your purse and loud enough to scare an attacker off. Unless the seller fixes my black one I would not recommend getting a black one. I would have given it five stars if the black one work properly.
customer_reviews.author: Jewish_princess

customer_reviews.title: Gun is great, belt pouch, not so much
customer_reviews.text: The stun gun works great. However the belt pouch fell apart immediately: there are about 2 stitches holding the belt-loop to the pouch. I took off one star because easy, rapid access to this defense tool is as important as having the tool itself. I don’t want to fumble for it in a pocket if/when I need it. I ordered a more robust belt-pouch - plenty here on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Salty Dog

customer_reviews.title: Sparky LOL
customer_reviews.text: I have used this item to break up dog fights. I used to take my dog to dog parks. Though I no longer do that due owners not taking control of their dogs. I will say when I had witness a dog fight all I had to do was fire this off and all dogs dispersed. I DO NOT USE THIS ON A DOG. I simply work with the sound. I told a friend of mine about it and she carries it due to some dogs in her area that have been threatening. Very nice item to have.
customer_reviews.author: Dittzyjj1

customer_reviews.title: Sounds Terrifying
customer_reviews.text: Just the noise alone is likely to send most people running. I carry it with me while I metal detect parks on the bad side of town. Since California has draconian self-protection laws, this does the trick. Left it in my car on a 110 degree weekend - still works no problem. I thought for sure it would be dead. Nope. Can't be beat for the price.
customer_reviews.author: TheHunterGT

customer_reviews.title: Great little stun gun!
customer_reviews.text: This little stun gun packs a whollop! When you press the button to activate it you hear a very loud cracking zapping sound. The flashlight is bright. I'm impressed with it as a persknal defense weapon. The seller is responsive if you have any issues. I had a problem with the little holder for the unit. I texted the seller and within a very short time I heard back and received a new holder.
customer_reviews.author: BJ

customer_reviews.title: Work great!
customer_reviews.text: So my husband purchased this for me because I started a new job and he wanted me to be protected at night..especially with all the sex trafficking stuff happening in our community...so fast forward to the day he gave it to me(after I specifically asked him not to buy it) he “tries” it out himself! Omg hands down the funniest thing I have ever seen! Thank you for the laughs! He is crazy and I now look forward to laughing everytime I open my purse and think of my husband shocking himself! This items works amazing by the way!
customer_reviews.author: Terri Tomlin

customer_reviews.title: Amazing for the Price!
customer_reviews.text: I read the rest of the reviews and figured this was going to be a great product for the price and I am pleasantly surprised. It really does pack a punch, I have not needed to use it yet but I did zap it in the air to see how it will work and knew that I would feel 100% safer taking my dog for a walk in the morning and at night. I don't live in the safest area in Portland, OR. You would think just walking my rescue Pitbull would ward off any attackers, but shes actually the sweetest thing and will probably kill them with kisses... A taser seemed to be the right answer for me.
customer_reviews.author: Tracey

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a deterrent for aggressive large dogs. It crackles loud and I’ve had this for 2 years now. No problems. I haven’t had to charge it either. You should be careful when having this in your pocket without the case on,the prongs will get caught in clothing and it will break. So have it pointed upward if doing so. Just cracking this thing in the air seems to scare most dogs I’ve seen.
customer_reviews.author: Review101

customer_reviews.title: Small but probably hurts
customer_reviews.text: I haven't had to use this on anyone (thank goodness) but I did test it after charging it per the instructions and the noise alone is startling. It's attached to the belt pouch I wear when I walk so I can easily reach it if needed and I feel much better about trying to use it than pepper spray since we often have windy days and this doesn't require as much precision in aiming it...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Stops Working for No Reason, Don’t Waste Your Money
customer_reviews.text: I bought it a while ago and it worked fine. So I just kept it in my bag all the time without using it. And I just checked it the other day it wasn’t working at all. So all this time I have been carrying it around thinking it would work in case I need it for who knows how long. I feel like I’m cheated of my money and my safety.
customer_reviews.author: Diane

customer_reviews.title: Novelty
customer_reviews.text: This is obviously a novelty. If you want to go drinking and shock your friends or something great product. It works well for that, easy to use. This is not a device intended for protection. It would not be a good choice for a lifesaving product if you need something for that talk to an expert and spend a little money.
customer_reviews.author: R. H.

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!
customer_reviews.text: Got this taser for my wife and all the females in my life. The wife used to carry pepper spray in her purse until it started leaking and we had to replace the cartridges every year. With this, she just keeps it charged and holds it (when she remembers to) when she's walking to her car at night. Don't really understand voltage or how strong this is, but when you press the button IT'S SCARY!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Small, powerful but fingers are close to electric zapper part being that it's small.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use. I do not like that it is so tiny that if your hands are big your fingers are so close to the electric part. I love that it had a carrier to it. But didn't like that the carrier was not functional as far as taking it out of the holster you almost have to touch the electric part again. Very powerful and the great thing about its compact size is it is compact enough to fit in a pocket.
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa Joy

customer_reviews.title: A great buy, Highly Recommend!
customer_reviews.text: Really, this is an amazing deal, what you get for such a reasonable price. It looks great, and has that soft silicone like material that's very pleasant. It fits perfectly in the side pocket of my purse, for easy access. It is loud, but that's expected, and I know will help deter an assailant. I charged it up first thing, and oh man it has an evil crackle when you push the button. And one of my absolute favorite features is the simple locking button, so you can feel secure that the on button won't get pressed accidentally, in your purse etc.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Umana

customer_reviews.title: Self protection  - Realtor
customer_reviews.text: Perfect self protection and flashlight combination. Clearly, it's a stun gun, but the fact that it's also a flashlight make it great for any Realtor out there showing houses. Hopefully, this will never be needed as a stun gun, but if it is necessary, then you have it. It could buy you enough time to get out of a bad situation.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly G.

customer_reviews.title: Great to carry around for protection with noise.
customer_reviews.text: I had my previous one for over 4 years. I go to the park & pesky squirrels try to get up on the picnic table because people that that don't know any better feed them. I have a dog that reacts (typical dog). I just give a quick noice & they are gone. Dosen't hurt them but noise deters them. I love this little tool.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Taser
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product to be able to protect myself. It works great and does exactly what it states it's supposed to do. The only thing that I do not like about it is that it does not have a kill switch in the event something was to happen and someone would try to take it out of my hand and try to use it on me. I like the fact that is rechargeable also.
customer_reviews.author: 2279Lady

customer_reviews.title: Powerful and reliable
customer_reviews.text: Not that I want to test just hoe powerful this is, I can already tell it's pretty strong. Got one for me and my wife, which is practically discreet enough to put in her purse or pocket. Charging is easy and lasts a long time. Highly recommended for families for daily defense and safety. Great purchase
customer_reviews.author: Aku

customer_reviews.title: Nice would recommend
customer_reviews.text: I was scared to buy this because people said they got theirs and parts were broken but i got mine in working order and was super careful putting it back in the holster so the power button wouldn’t slide up and turn on..(.may need to change that feature). But overall i give it a 4.5 stars
customer_reviews.author: Juju

customer_reviews.title: Just what I wanted
customer_reviews.text: Just what I wanted. I leave work late at night in a sketchy Las Vegas neighborhood so this is exactly what I wanted, just some extra protection. Easy to use and very loud, noise enough should be a deterrent. The only issue is the slide button on the bottom to extend the charging prongs is not sturdy at all, I have to be very careful with it.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: Perfect & Convenient
customer_reviews.text: I love this device. I take it with me when I'm walking my dog, since a lot of strays roam the neighborhood. I love that it doubles as a flashlight. I was taking a big flashlight AND pepper spray with me before I bought this. Now I only need to carry the stun gun. It's really loud and the perfect size. I appreciate that the red light switches on when the voltage is active. And I'm so happy that it's rechargeable and comes with a case. I've only had it for a month, but have seen no issues.
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: Trigger Happy
customer_reviews.text: It’s loud and terrifying...so exactly what I wanted. My only issue is it’s so easy to turn the shock mode on! If you try to slip it into the nice case that comes with it, it will turn on! You really have to be careful with it. For that reason I am only giving 4/5 stars. Otherwise it seems like the perfect self defense tool
customer_reviews.author: Danielle R.

customer_reviews.title: Scary but cool
customer_reviews.text: Scares me when I turn it on. I hope I never have to use it. It's loud and scary to me lol recommend to feel a little more protected (:
customer_reviews.author: Ayylmao

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I bought this stunt gun because I usually go out by myself hiking or jogging and it really makes me feel secure to have something to defend myself with. The reason I gave this product 4 stars only is because the carrier pouch is really cheap quality and I really like the idea of having something to carry the stunt gun in. I wish that it would have been made out of sturdier material that way I won’t lose it while walking or jogging but, overall the stunt gun is great! And definitely affordable.
customer_reviews.author: Arleen

customer_reviews.title: Problems already
customer_reviews.text: The stun gun still functions, but the cases are cheap junk. The first case came ripped. The seller saw my original review and sent 2 new cases. One of the replacement cases ripped as soon as I received it. I gave my stun gun to a friend of mine that is really small, in case she ever had any problems and had to defend herself. The replacement case that she has on it immediately ripped and is useless. I would spend more money on a better one. Preferably from a different company. I don't trust the quality of these after seeing 3 cases rip.
customer_reviews.author: eBay_Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is good
customer_reviews.text: If you electrocute ANYBODY in the face, spine or genitals, I can pretty much guarantee the attack is DONE!!.. You want back of the neck... FACE or throat, and their JUNK , you hit them there... FIGHT'S OVER!
customer_reviews.author: Wolf L.

customer_reviews.title: Taser good, flashlight junk!
customer_reviews.text: If you’re buying this taser as a back up or to keep in your car it’s fine but if you’re using it as a safety device in conjuction with the flashlight, forget it. My iphone puts out 10 times more light than this, you’re better off relying on the moon and street lights to see!
customer_reviews.author: J. Barrell

customer_reviews.title: Works as described
customer_reviews.text: The unit is small and I have placed it on my belt. It is a little cumbersome to remove it from the holster. I might change to another holster later. However the small compact size is convenient for me to carry always. The built in charging plug is easy to use. the flash and sound should do the trick. I have not actually used it in a situation yet, hopefully I won't have to.
customer_reviews.author: Tractor Guy

customer_reviews.title: Ouch
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to shock my friends. It works haha. It won't knock anyone to the floor but will definitely leave pinhead burn marks and severe pain.
customer_reviews.author: EzE

customer_reviews.title: Love my little zapper !
customer_reviews.text: It is loud but I think that's a good thing cus if someone doesnt back off when they hear it then they're getting a fukn taze to the neck. It does knock you on your ass, it charges well and it is discreet in my purse or pocket...you'll never know...really good purchase for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Smash

customer_reviews.title: Pack-a-Wallop
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use. A belt-loop keeper for quick access. Takes up little space in a purse. Unlike the battery powered units this is an electric wall-unit charged model ( every 1-2 months ). The sparking, crack and pop in-use sound this make's will have vicious dogs or other predators running away.
customer_reviews.author: Rolex2Tophorseman1

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and compact
customer_reviews.text: To be honest this fits in your back pocket when you are walking and in your purse. The flashlight is very handy I take to walk my dog at night and to be honest having it makes me feel alot safer. Very easy to use and very easy to charge would charge it in a counter top height outlet if you have small children though because it is so easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Frida Simpson

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: This item is as described and works like it is supposed to. The carry case is a bit tight. I wouldn't be able to get it out in a hurry if I needed to, so the case is useless to me. I took this with me camping recently in very hot temps. Fortunately I didn't need it, but when I returned home and unpacked it, the rubber coating had all melted. It still works fine from what I can tell.
customer_reviews.author: lak

customer_reviews.title: It'll do the trick
customer_reviews.text: I like the looks of it. It does seem to have that good shock sound to it when you test it and I like that. The light it decent enough to use it as you walk to your vehicle after work or something like that. If I ever have to use it I will update my review.😎♌
customer_reviews.author: wandacosmo2010

customer_reviews.title: Handy Protection
customer_reviews.text: After the initial 6 hour charge-up (per instructions) we’ve been happy with this, replacing our old one (not recharging well after 10 years). It came with its own nylon black case - has a belt loop on one side. Size-wise, it fits inside my hand easily & doesn’t feel bulky or heavy
customer_reviews.author: C. A. Westphal

customer_reviews.title: We are living in the last days
customer_reviews.text: We are certainly living in the last days. Right now is coronavirus and what’s next? Global economic collapse? There’s going to be war and rumors of war, famine, pestilence, earthquakes in various places. Jesus told His disciples to sell what they have and buy a sword. This is something I need to have since I work in a grocery store and there might be riots. This world is not our home. Repent while you still have a chance and put on the full armor of God! Protect yourself and your loved ones. May the Lord Jesus Christ be with you!
customer_reviews.author: Thomas M.

customer_reviews.title: Senior, no longer in Fear!
customer_reviews.text: Best gift I ever bought for my safety. Am 72 and feel safe when I walk my 2 small dogs early am n late evening. Purchased 2 other for granddaughter away at college. Life is full of surprises, always best to be aware, had other Sun guns, but this one fits well in hand, led light is bright n I like built in plug recharge. I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Gives me a sense of security
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as I work doing delivery and travel all over town. There were some riots in our area when I bought this, thankfully I have not had to use it as of yet. I keep it in my car and it gives a sense of security knowing I have something with me. It is very loud, the sound alone may scare someone away. For the price I am very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Jo P.

product_meta.title: VIPERTEK VTS-880-30 Billion Mini Stun Gun - Rechargeable with LED Flashlight, Black
product_meta.description: The VIPERTEK VTS-880 mini stun gun really packs a punch! Just test firing this unit into the air is often enough to stop an attacker. As the bright electric current pulsates between the test prongs and creates an intimidating electrical sound, an attacker with any sense at all will be stopped in his tracks. If the sight and sound doesn't stop him, a jolt from this stun gun certainly will bring an attacker down! When an attacker is touched by the stun gun it will disrupt the message the brain sends to the voluntary muscles. Simply touching an attacker will deliver a high voltage shock causing loss of balance and muscle control, confusion, and disorientation bringing him to his knees and making him incapable of further aggressive activity. Due to restrictions in some states, county and city laws we do not ship to the following locations: Hawaii, Massachusetts, Michigan, Connecticut, New Jersey, Illinois, New York, Rhode Island, Wisconsin, District of Columbia, Annapolis, MD, Baltimore, MD, Chicago, IL, Philadelphia, PA, Baltimore County, MD, Crawford County,IA VIPERTEK is a registered US trademark.
feature_bullets: Powerful Mini Stun Gun With LED Flashlight
Compact Size, Conceals Easily (2" x 7/8" x 4") - Slips easily into a pocket or purse
Internal Rechargeable Battery - No expensive batteries to buy
